text: Mee ga daa gi daha dana palaawaa e dahi i nia palaawaa ala digi hagatanga gi nia ‘yeast’ ala i lodo di gada ala ne haga dabu ang gi Dimaadua, mo di palaawaa e dahi dela ne unugi gi nia lolo, ge dahi bagu baabaa, gaa dugu nia mee aanei gi hongo nia kiliidi mo i hongo di wae gau donu o di manu.
